apps.localizedDescription: This app is purely for entertainment purposes and is not intended to predict or influence real-life events. Any countdown generated by the app is entirely fictional and should not be taken seriously. I am not affiliated with the creators of the movie Countdown and is not responsible for any emotional, psychological, or other effects caused by the use of this app. By using this app, you agree to do so at your own discretion and risk.
apps.name: Countdown
apps.subtitle: If you could know exactly when you're going to die, would you want to know?
apps.versionDescription: UI improvements and bug fixes for stability. The release notes are in the github page.

versions.localizedDescription: UI improvements and bug fixes for stability. The release notes are in the github page.

The app now supports iPadOS, it may look squished and uneven on some models. This will be fixed in the next update.The app now supports all iOS and iPadOS versions from 15.6 onward. Before it was only compatible for verions 17.0+. Compatibility with Xcode 14.0 and later has been added to ensure smoother development and builds. The countdown numbers will now only turn red when reaching zero, this was not the case before. Rest of the release notes are in the github page
UI improvements and bug fixes for stability.
